review1.title: Mrs. martina
review1.content: Very good work and pleasant communication! Thank you

review2.title: Mr. fitimffa
review2.content: Work was really good. Exactly how I wanted it. He kept me always up to date. Will work with him again, since we have a lot more dashboards to do :-) Would recommend.

review3.title: Mr. finn
review3.content: Simple and clean; Designed exactly how I wanted it; very good communication; I highly recommend
